content: MFT-PJV joint profile Profile for closing panel joints ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easing the installation by centering and guiding the panel joint along the profile Closing the panel gap to avoid humidity damage Can be used in horizontal and vertical application Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Joint profile to cover the joint between two vertical panels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Width: 62 mm Length: 2500 mm Material composition: Aluminium Technical Data | Width | 62 mm | Length | 2500 mm | Material composition | Aluminium ### ITEMS- 2030652 - Profile MFT-PJV 62 2,5m - Package Size 25 m - 2030648 - Profile MFT-PJV 62 2,5m black - Package Size 25 m
